TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件直观指示较长的操作之一中的三种样式的进度：A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles: - 在从左到右的步骤中增加的分段的块。Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right. - 在填充从左到右连续栏。A continuous bar that fills in from left to right. - 跨滚动块选框方式。A block that scrolls across a in a marquee fashion. 属性确定的样式显示。The property determines the style of that is displayed. 请注意，控件只能是水平方向。Note that the control can only be oriented horizontally. 有关如何创建垂直方向的示例，请参阅类。For an example of how to create a vertically oriented , see the class. 控件通常用于应用程序执行任务，例如将文件复制或打印文档时。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 应用程序的用户可以考虑应用程序停止响应，如果没有视觉提示。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 通过使用中你的应用程序，则你发出警报用户应用程序正在执行较长任务和应用程序是否仍然响应。By using the in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和属性定义值来表示任务的进度的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为值为 0，和属性通常设置为一个值，该值的任务完成。The property is typically set to a value of 0, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要正确复制文件，一组时显示进度属性无法设置为的文件总数，要复制。For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序已完成该操作的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 显示的值仅仅是近似于的当前值属性。The value displayed by the only approximates the current value of the property. 基于大小、属性确定何时将显示下一个块，或增加条的大小。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar. 有多种方法可以修改所显示的值以外更改直接属性。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 你可以使用属性来指定特定值要递增属性，，然后调用方法值增量。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要更改增量值，可以使用方法并指定具有要递增的值属性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value with which to increment the property. > [!NOTE] > 和更改上启用了可视样式时将不会生效[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和更高版本。 and changes for the will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用和属性以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 代码还使用具有属性方法的值递增复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你拥有创建调用控件`pBar1`，将创建在并且没有一种方法创建调用`CopyFile`（它返回一个布尔值，表明文件复制操作已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要一个包含要复制的文件的字符串数组是创建并传递给`CopyWithProgress`示例中定义的方法和从另一个方法或事件中的调用方法， 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Increment(int32 value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 增加进度栏的当前位置所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够通过特定量递增的值的进度栏。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此方法的递增进度栏是类似于使用具有属性方法。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果是，在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值将保持属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果是，在调用一个含有负值中指定的方法`value`参数，属性小于的值属性，属性仍然保持为值属性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因为对象的样式设置为显示连续滚动条，而不是其，则调用无必要存在并将引发。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性的值递增中事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此示例还显示中的属性提供的文本表示形式。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求你拥有控件，名为`progressBar1`，和一个包含控件命名`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 命名`time`，必须添加到窗体作为成员。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarqueeAnimationSpeed { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

value.span: 进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字幕样式进度指示器不显示进度;相反，它指示操作正在发生通过移动进度块在进度栏内。A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar. 由于字幕动画速度是一个时间段，将该值设置为较低的速度较高数字会产生和较低的数字会产生更快的速度。Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.

span.span: The indicated time period is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件范围的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
The maximum value of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的上限属性。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 时的值属性更改，重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值完全填充属性，进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 你可以使用此属性指定值以向其属性必须设置 (通过设置属性或使用或方法) 来指示操作已完成。You can use this property to specify a value to which the property must be set (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，你可以设置的值属性设置为的文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 复制文件时，每次属性可以加 1，直到复制的文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用和属性以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 代码还使用具有属性方法的值递增复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你拥有创建调用控件`pBar1`，将创建在并且没有一种方法创建调用`CopyFile`（它返回一个布尔值，表明文件复制操作已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要一个包含要复制的文件的字符串数组是创建并传递给`CopyWithProgress`示例中定义的方法和从另一个方法或事件中的调用方法， 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Minimum { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件范围的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range of the control.
The minimum value of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的下限属性。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 时的值属性更改，重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值属性，进度栏为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度栏的值，使用具有属性方法，请使用方法，或设置的值直接属性。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用和属性以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 代码还使用具有属性方法的值递增复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你拥有创建调用控件`pBar1`，将创建在，以及是否有一种方法创建调用`CopyFile`（它返回一个布尔值，表明文件复制操作已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要一个包含要复制的文件的字符串数组是创建并传递给`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用方法， 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnForeColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnForeColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了可视样式，并且操作系统支持视觉样式，更改将不会生效。 changes will not be honored when visual styles are enabled and the operating system supports visual styles.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将进度栏的值递增所指定的量属性。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 你可以使用属性指定在操作中的每个已完成的任务的进度栏的值更改量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果您要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值属性设置为 1 和的值属性设置为要复制的文件总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 复制每个文件后，你可以调用方法的值增加进度栏属性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果你想要更灵活地控制进度栏的值，则可以使用方法设置的值或直接属性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果是，在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值将保持属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果是，在调用一个含有负值中指定的方法、属性小于的值属性，属性的值将保持属性.If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in , the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因为对象的样式设置为显示连续滚动条，而不是其，则调用无必要存在并将引发。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用和属性以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 代码还使用具有属性方法的值递增复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你拥有创建调用控件`pBar1`，将创建在，以及是否有一种方法创建调用`CopyFile`（它返回一个布尔值，表明文件复制操作已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要一个包含要复制的文件的字符串数组是创建并传递给`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用方法， 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将重置到除非在派生类中重写方法。Calling this method will reset the to unless the method is overridden in a derived class. 方法很有用，在创建该控件的设计器或创建您自己包含的控件时。The method is useful when you create a designer for the control, or you are creating your own control that incorporates the .

value.span: 如果 从右向左显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is displayed from right to left; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用从右到左阅读的语言创建用于应用程序时，属性很有用。The property is useful when creating an application for use with languages that read from right to left.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ProgressBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ProgressBar1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#519)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#519)]

summary.span: 获取或设置调用 方法增加进度栏的当前位置时所根据的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount by which a call to the method increases the current position of the progress bar.

value.span: 每次调用 方法增加进度栏时所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar with each call to the method.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性指定在操作中的每个已完成的任务的进度栏的值更改量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果您要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值属性设置为 1 和的值属性设置为要复制的文件总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 复制每个文件后，你可以调用方法的值增加进度栏属性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果你想要更灵活地控制进度栏的值，则可以使用方法设置的值或直接属性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用和属性以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 代码还使用具有属性方法的值递增复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求你拥有创建调用控件`pBar1`，将创建在，以及是否有一种方法创建调用`CopyFile`（它返回一个布尔值，表明文件复制操作已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要一个包含要复制的文件的字符串数组是创建并传递给`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用方法， 。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你需要以指示操作正在进行，而不需要指示进度的数量时，你可以使用选框形式。You can use the marquee style when you need to indicate progress is being made, without indicating the quantity of progress. 样式仅当启用了可视样式时才有效。The style is honored only when visual styles are enabled. 样式未启用视觉样式时才有效。The style is honored when visual styles are not enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of the progress bar.
The position within the range of the progress bar.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大值通过指定属性和属性。The minimum and maximum values of the property are specified by the and properties. 此属性使您递增或递减的进度栏直接的值。This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly. 若要连贯性增加的值中控件可以使用具有属性方法。To perform consistent increases in the value of the control you can use the property with the method. 若要通过不同数量增加进度栏值，请使用方法。To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性的值递增中事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此示例还显示中的属性提供的文本表示形式。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求你拥有控件，名为`progressBar1`，和一个包含控件命名`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 命名`time`，必须添加到窗体作为成员。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]
